rukus.text: haneul-eneun manh-eun cheonsadeul-i iss eudoe geudeul-ui jungjaeneun hananim-i seon taeghan ja-ege geubun-ui heolag-i issneun ihuga anigoneun yuyonghaji moshanola
naeseleul midji anihan jadeul-eun cheonsadeul-eul yeoseong-ila buleuni
geudeul-eun alji mosham-ila geudeul eun eogcheugman-eul ttaleul ppun-ila sillo eogcheug-eun jinlie daehayeo amugeosdo yu hyohaji anhnola
hananim-ui mesejileul oemyeonhaneunja geudaedo geudeul-eul oemyeonhala geudeul eun hyeonseman-eul chuguhal ppun-ila
geugeos-eun geudeul-i algo issneun geos-ila sillo junim-eun geubun-ui gil-eseo beos-eonan jadeul-eul asigo gyesimyeo tto han bog-eum-eul bad-eun geudeuldo algo gyesinila

haneulgwa daejie issneun modeun geos-i hananim an-e iss-eo saagham-eul peotteulineun ja geuui haeng-wie ttala beol-eulnaelil geos-iyo seon-eul silcheonhaneun ja gajang joh-eun geos-eulo bosanghal geos-ila

keun joeaggwa suchiseuleoun haeng-wi leul pihalyeo haneun jaga jag-eun silsu leul hayeoss-eul ttae sillo junim-eun chungbun hi gwan-yong-eul bepusinila hananim-eun heulg-eseo changjohan neohuileul asimyeo tto han neohui eomeoni taenaee iss-eul ttaeuineohuido asinani neohui seuseuloga wanjeonhan geos-ila jeongdanghwa haji malla geubun-eun saag-eulobuteo gyeong-oehaneun jaleul algo gyesinila
